# LABOR

## counts

### pre-/post-war
```{r top labor bigrams pre- vs. post-war period, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, cache=FALSE, cache.lazy = FALSE}

tags$iframe(
  src = "figures/top_labor_bigrams_pre_war.html",
  scrolling = "no",
  frameBorder = "0",
  height=500,
  width="100%"
)

tags$iframe(
  src = "figures/top_labor_bigrams_post_war.html",
  scrolling = "no",
  frameBorder = "0",
  height=500,
  width="100%"
)

```

## co-occurrence

co-occurrences with enviro keywords in labor speeches

```{r enviro co-occurrence keywords}

enviroVocab <- c("^environ",
                        "^ecolog",
                        "^ecosyst",
                        "^pollut",
                        "^wildlif",
                        "^wilder") %>%
  as_tibble()

  
enviroVocab

```
